languages.text: "Ты права. Производство сервиторов — бесчеловечная практика. Я хотел{mf||а} бы остановить ее — но это не в моей власти".
"You are right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it is not within my power."
languages.original_text: "Ты права. Производство сервиторов — бесчеловечная практика. Я хотел{mf||а} бы остановить ее — но это не в моей власти".

traits.locale_text: "You're right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it's not within my power."
"You're right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it's not within my power."
"You're right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it's not within my power."
"You are right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it is not within my power."
"You are right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it is not within my power."
"You are right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it is not within my power."

languages.text: “你说得没错，机仆改造确实很不人道。我希望我能结束这种暴行，但这并不在我的能力范围内。”
languages.original_text: "You are right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it is not within my power."

traits.locale_text: “你说得没错，奴工改造确实很不人道。我希望我能结束这种暴行，但这并不在我的能力范围内。”

languages.text: «Tienes razón. La creación de servidores es inhumana. Ojalá pudiera acabar con ella... pero no está en mi mano».
languages.original_text: "You are right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it is not within my power."

traits.locale_text: «Tienes razón. La creación de servidores es inhumana. Ojalá pudiera acabar con ella... pero no está en mi mano».

languages.text: 「そうだな。サーヴィターの製造は非人道的だ。終わらせることができればいいのだが…{mf|俺|私}では力不足だ」
languages.original_text: "You are right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it is not within my power."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだな。サーヴィターの製造は非人道的だ。終わらせることができればいいのだが…{mf|俺|私}では力不足だ」

languages.text: "Ihr habt recht. Die Produktion von Servitoren ist unmenschlich. Ich wünschte, ich könnte sie beenden – aber das steht nicht in meiner Macht."
languages.original_text: "You are right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it is not within my power."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt recht. Die Produktion von Servitoren ist unmenschlich. Ich wünschte, ich könnte sie beenden – aber das steht nicht in meiner Macht."

languages.text: « Vous avez raison. La production de servitors est une chose non-humaine. J'aimerais pouvoir y mettre un terme, mais cela n'est pas en mon pouvoir. »
languages.original_text: "You are right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it is not within my power."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez raison. La production de servitors est une chose inhumaine. J'aimerais pouvoir y mettre un terme, mais cela n'est pas en mon pouvoir. »

languages.text: "Haklısın. Hizmetör üretimi insanlık dışı. Keşke buna bir son verebilseydim. Gelgelelim gücüm dâhilinde değil."
languages.original_text: "You are right. Servitor production is inhumane. I wish I could put an end to it — but it is not within my power."

traits.locale_text: "Haklısın. Servitör üretimi insanlık dışı. Keşke buna bir son verebilseydim ama gücüm dâhilinde değil."
